<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update model-to-site linking (bulk)"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/models/site"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates visibility of multiple models at the current site in a single operation.

**Use Cases**
- Bulk enable/disable models for a site
- Site model catalog management
- Mass visibility updates

**Request Format**
Send a dictionary mapping ModelId (GUID) to enabled state (boolean).

**Example**
```json
{
  "model-id-1": true,
  "model-id-2": false
}
```

**Related Endpoints**
- [POST /api/v1.0/models/\{ModelId\}/site](/docs/api/models/set-model-site-visibility) - Single model visibility
- [POST /api/v1.0/models/bulk/site](/docs/api/models/bulk-add-models-to-site) - Bulk add with site options

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":{"type":"boolean"},"description":"Dictionary of ModelId (GUID) to enabled state (boolean)"},"example":{"8b7f9421-1b0a-4dd4-d7c7-498f1954f69a":true,"9c800532-2c1b-5ee5-e8d8-50902065a70b":false}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
